radiographic_examinations.findings: Enhancing gallbladder wall with mild pericholecystic fluid.

Trace right pleural effusion, bibasilar atelectasis, tiny T2 hyperintense cystic lesion near liver dome, multiple gallstones with gallbladder-wall edema and pericholecystic fluid, splenomegaly with multiple unchanged lesions compatible with hemangiomas.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Redemonstration of multiple gallstones with gallbladder-wall edema and pericholecystic fluid and stranding, similar to prior CT.
